model.online

Class ServerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.online.ServerClient

  • public class ServerClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a client from the point of view of Server; particularly, it is uniquely associated with a ServerClientThread that sends and gets information from an specific client, and the server (class Server)
    Author:
    PMC

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyClientToChooseTeam(org.json.JSONObject gameConfigJSON)
      This method tells the ServerClientThread to send to client the request of choosing in which team it wants to play
      void setUpServerClientConnection(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
      This method creates a new ServerClientThread so that it can communicate across the accepted socket
      void updateGraphics(org.json.JSONObject json)
      This method tells the ServerClientThread to send to client the new information of game (json) that has been sent from another client

      • setUpServerClientConnection

        public void setUpServerClientConnection(java.net.Socket socket,
                                        Server server)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method creates a new ServerClientThread so that it can communicate across the accepted socket
        Parameters:
        socket - Socket that has been accepted by server
        server - The server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - completar

      • updateGraphics

        public void updateGraphics(org.json.JSONObject json)
        This method tells the ServerClientThread to send to client the new information of game (json) that has been sent from another client
        Parameters:
        json - JSONObject that contains a new game information from another client

      • notifyClientToChooseTeam

        public void notifyClientToChooseTeam(org.json.JSONObject gameConfigJSON)
        This method tells the ServerClientThread to send to client the request of choosing in which team it wants to play
        Parameters:
        gameConfigJSON - JSONObject that contains an incomplete game configuration so that client can complete it with its team preference
